request.description: Use this endpoint to get all funconnect places.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Ikeja city mall", // min:3, max:255
    "headline": "Ikeja city mall headline", // min:3, max:255
    "description": "Ikeja city mall description", // also known as about
    "added_by": "The uuid of the author", // data type: uuid
    "opens_at": "12:00", // format H:i
    "closes_at": "10:00", // format H:i
    "phone_e164": "080##", // e164 phone number
    "cover": "file", // image cover for place 
    "address": "address",
    "city": "city",
    "state": "state",
    "country": "country",
    "latitude": "38.8951",
    "longitude": "-78.8951"
}

Use this endpoint to create event categories

request.description: Use this endpoint to retrieve a category from the funconnect events service category.
Use this endpoint to update existing event category in the funconnect events service database

response.name: error response

request.description: Use this endpoint to only update category status when needed. The {status} var represents either "active or inactive" status. Anything other than this will result to an error.
Use this endpoint to delete or remove an event category

request.description: Use this endpoint to delete user saved event

item.description: Find all endpoints related to saved events.

request.description: Use this endpoint to get all the events in the funconnect events database. Please note that this endpoint gets you all the events irrespective of it's visibility status in the database.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "event title",
    "category_id":"uuid", // required, category id
    "user_id": "uuid", // existing user id,
    "cover": "file", // cover image,
    "description": "event description",
    "date": "date", // required,
    "time": "time", // required,
    "seats": "seat", // integer,
    "type": "event type", // required event type:public or private,
    "price": "90.00", // leave empty or null if event is free,
    "address": "event address",
    "city": "event city",
    "state": "state",
    "country": "country",
    "latitude": "latitude",
    "longitude": "longitude",
    "authenticated-user": {"user_id":"uuid"}
}
